title: " Everything was forbidden'- were the CAVID-19 restrictions that Orwell signed in 1984?
subtitle: In the middle of the COVID-19 closure rules in 2020, social media users appeared to "discover" a brand-new quote from the classic Dystopian novel "1984.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: "Everything but work was forbidden: walking on the streets, having fun, singing, dancing, meeting, everything was forbidden."
